section.title: One Water Heater, Single Temperature, with Building Recirculation
section.p: Before installation of water piping, review the following:

ol.li: Thermal Expansion and Closed Water Systems
If a pump is being installed between a water heater and storage tank or on a building recirculation loop wire, see .
If a pump is being installed in a recirculation loop between the water heater and a commercial dishwasher wire, see .
